radiographic_examinations.findings: A solitary 7-mm right perihilar (level 11R) noncalcified node with mild to moderate 68Ga-PSMA-ligand avidity; scattered bilateral micronodules (<5 mm), stable over several years.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Follow-up PET/CT performed 3 months later showed mild reduction in 68Ga-PSMA-ligand uptake within the morphologically stable node.
